name: Gods of the Twilight
storyline: You're a reincarnated god, but that doesn't stop you from being a dork. You don't even remember not being human, but you'd better—Ragnarök is coming, and supernatural and government forces have their own plans for you. Can you juggle that with your social/romantic life in this episodic visual novel?
summary: Gods of the Twilight is a multi-season episodic visual novel that places you in a dystopian near-future where old magic is reemerging in a world on the brink of Norse mythology's apocalypse. Play as two protagonists—one woman, one man. Explore government conspiracies and attempt to navigate your social and romantic lives while a decaying future world faces Ragnarök, and ancient truths about you and your companions start to resurface.
